tossupQ:
PHYSICS  Multiple Choice  The slope of a velocity versus time graph represents: 
 
W)  acceleration 
X)  velocity 
Y)  position 
Z)  displacement
bonusQ:
PHYSICS  Multiple Choice  Under which of the following conditions is the average velocity 
equal to the average of an object’s initial and final velocity: 
 
W)  always  
X)  never  
Y)  only when the acceleration changes  
Z)  only when the acceleration is constant
bonusA: Z)  ONLY WHEN THE ACCELERATION IS CONSTANT

tossupQ:
CHEMISTRY  Multiple Choice  Which of the following is an EXTENSIVE property of matter: 
 
W)  temperature 
X)  density 
Y)  mass  
Z)  viscosity
tossupA:
Y)  MASS 
 
(Solution: extensive properties depend on the amount of substance present)

passing through fog at night?

bonusQ:
BIOLOGY  Multiple Choice  Which of the following is NOT true of the human body: 
 
W)  there are substantial numbers of lymph nodes in the wall of the large intestine 
X)  veins have comparatively thick walls with more muscle than arteries  
Y)  there are two layers of smooth muscle in the walls of the small intestine 
Z)  the small intestine is longer than the large intestine
bonusA:
X)  VEINS HAVE COMPARATIVELY THICK WALLS WITH MORE MUSCLE 
THAN ARTERIES

tossupQ:
CHEMISTRY  Multiple Choice  Boyle’s gas law concerns which of the following two 
variables: 
 
W)  volume and pressure  
X)  volume and temperature  
Y)  pressure and temperature  
Z)  pressure and moles
bonusQ:
CHEMISTRY  Short Answer  What mass of sodium hydroxide, in grams, would contain 40 
grams of oxygen?
bonusA:
100 
 
(Solution:  NaOH = 40g × 1 mol O/16 × 1 mol NaOH/1 mol O × 40g NaOH/1 mol NaOH = 100g)
